description: App becomes unresponsive for more than 5 seconds, triggering Android's Application Not Responding dialog. Critical user experience issue.
commonCauses: Large file I/O on main thread
solutions: Move all blocking operations to background threads
Use Kotlin coroutines with Dispatchers.IO or Dispatchers.Default
Implement async operations with proper threading
Break large operations into smaller chunks
Profile with Android Profiler to find bottlenecks
prevention: Never do network calls on main thread - use Retrofit with coroutines
All database operations must be async (Room handles this)
Limit work in onCreate/onStart to UI setup only
Use StrictMode during development to catch violations
Set timeouts on all blocking operations
